Name: Hop Toad #2
Ingredients: 50 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
30 ml De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur
10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of apricot wedge or dried apricot half.
Garnish with apricot wedge or half.
Review: Alcoholic apricot jam with a lovely twang of aged rum.
Nutrition: One serving of Hop Toad #2 contains 209 calories
